was justified, for Pierre turned away from the aunt without wait- ing to hear her speech about Her Majesty's health. Anna Pdvlovna in dismay detained him with the words: "Do you know the Abbe 
Morio? He is a most interesting man." 
"Yes, I have heard of his scheme for perpet- ual peace, and it is very interesting but hardly feasible." 
"You think so?" rejoined Anna Pdvlovna in order to say something and get away to attend to her duties as hostess. But Pierre now com- mitted a reverse act of imp
